bwwExcerpt: On the other hand, Michele's performances of 'I'm the Greatest Star' and 'Don't Rain On My Parade' are absolutely exhilarating, prompting frenzied excitement and mid-show standing ovations. Michele also throws herself into her character's comedy bits, even though her efforts are more hard-working than inspired or genuinely funny.
